function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infections caused by design constraints and ventilation issues in quarantine buildings","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases within quarantine facilities and into the community","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, redesign common areas, and implement stricter protocols for quarantine facilities","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation technology, air purification systems, and real-time air quality monitoring","People":"Quarantined individuals, community residents","Owner":"Government health agencies, architects, building developers"},{"Description":"System failure leading to seeding events into the community","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases in the community","Mitigation":"Improve quarantine protocols, enhance surveillance and monitoring, and implement early detection systems","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, early detection systems, and data analysis tools","People":"Community residents, public health authorities","Owner":"Government health agencies, local authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate urban sewer systems for early detection of virus fragments in wastewater","Impact":"Delayed identification of virus circulation in the community, leading to potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Upgrade urban sewer systems for spatially stratified sampling of wastewater, implement advanced wastewater testing techniques, and invest in wastewater surveillance infrastructure","Technologies":"Wastewater testing technology, spatial sampling equipment, and automated data analysis tools","People":"Community residents, public health authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners"}]}
